settings.title: Streamlined Modern Image Reading
settings.html: With the diversification of image reading environments, the workload of tasks Radiologists perform while reading has increased. The Eizo RadiForce RX370 has you covered, providing a complete solution that includes quality control and connectivity options so Radiologists can work efficiently in various scenes.

settings.title: Boost Images for Easy Viewing
settings.content:
Quickly maximize your monitor’s brightness to make detailed medical images easier to see with Instant Backlight Booster. This function uses a single hotkey to adjust the brightness of a single monitor or a group of monitors at once.

DICOM Part 14 is not supported while Instant Backlight Booster is on.

settings.title: Barrier-Free Workstyle
settings.content:
Use a single mouse and keyboard to simultaneously operate two different workstations with the Switch-and-Go function. When working across multiple displays, simply move your cursor from one screen to the other or switch between workstations without the tedium of changing the mouse and keyboard each time, therefore increasing efficiency by reducing the number of monitors in your workflow.
DICOM Part 14 is not supported while Instant Backlight Booster is on.

settings.title: Eye Relief with Gentle Light
settings.content: Radiologists know the eye strain caused by viewing a bright monitor in a dark environment for long periods, so RadiLight provides a solution. Attach the optional RadiLight light directly to the back of a Eizo RadiForce RX370 monitor to illuminate the wall behind it without taking up any additional desk space, ensuring there are no reflections on the screen that could interrupt reading.

settings.title: Display Both Monochrome and Color
settings.content: Optimize every pixel in your display with the Hybrid Gamma PXL function, which creates a hybrid display by automatically distinguishing between monochrome and color images pixel by pixel. The result is that monochrome images are displayed in DICOM Part 1 compliant greyscale, while color images are effectively reproduced corresponding to Gamma 2.2. This improves the efficiency of viewing both monochrome and color images together on one screen, allowing Radiologists to read CR and DR alongside color endoscopy, nuclear medicine, 3D rendering, and fusion without worrying about diminished image quality.

settings.title: Achieve Clarity True to the Source Data
settings.content:
To meet the performance standards of a medical monitor, a display must be capable of high brightness. However, the crux of LCD monitors is the increased pixel aperture necessary to achieve a high luminosity, which inevitably leads to a decline in sharpness over time. But with Eizo’s unique Sharpness Recovery technology, the frustrating decrease in sharpness (MTF) can be restored, allowing you to safely and effectively display images true to the original source data, even at high brightness levels.
MTF measures numerically how faithfully the panel transfers details from the original image data for viewing. When Sharpness Recovery is turned on, in the case of a 2-pixel line pair (spatial frequency of 1.182 cycles/mm) the MTF increases by approximately over 50%.

settings.title: Make the Precise Diagnosis
settings.content: To ensure every monitor is compliant with DICOM Part 14, Eizo carefully measures and sets the greyscale at the factory. Upon startup or wakeup, images are ready to be faithfully reproduced with stable brightness and greyscale thanks to the Eizo patented drift correction function. This technology quickly stabilizes the brightness level and compensates for fluctuations caused by the ambient temperature and the passage of time.

settings.title: Hassle-Free Multi-Monitor Configuration
settings.content: Drive several monitors in a daisy chain sequence by using the DisplayPort connection, allowing you to configure a hassle-free multi-monitor setup without excessive cabling.A graphics board that supports daisy chain is necessary.

settings.title: Elegant Cabinet Design
settings.content:
Focus on the images you’re reading, not the screen’s bezels with the RX370’s black bezel design, ideal for dark reading rooms. Plus, the unique white stripe around the sides and curves on the back of the monitor creates a clean, elegant aesthetic.
DICOM Part 14 is not supported while Instant Backlight Booster is on.

settings.title: USB Hub and USB Type-C for Charging
settings.content: Easily connect a mouse, keyboard, or other USB devices with two USB Type-A downstream ports built into the monitor. An additional USB Type-C port with up to 15 watt power supply is excellent for charging smartphones and tablets and does not allow the computer access to your device’s memory or settings, maintaining security while connected.

settings.title: Maintain Image Quality Over Time
settings.content:
Inevitably, an LCD monitor’s brightness and color gradually shift over time with repeated use, making it difficult to detect. Implementing a quality control solution is crucial to ensuring your monitor’s display stays consistent. With the Integrated Front Sensor (IFS) built into the front bezel of the RadiForce monitor and RadiCS LE software (included), you can easily calibrate to DICOM Part 14 without having to mount, run, and remove an external sensor.

Simple calibration using the monitor backlight sensor is also supported.

settings.title: Evolve Your Image Reading
settings.content: Radiologists view more and more information on their screens as image modalities become digitalized, so Eizo’s Work-and-Flow functions are great for simplifying the imaging workflow, operating in tandem with RadiForce monitors and RadiCS LE software.

settings.title: Features
settings.html:
• Integrated Front Sensor (IFS)
  • Instant Backlight Booster function temporarily maxes the brightness of the monitor for quickly making detailed medical images easier to see
  • Switch-and-Go function – operate two different workstations at the same time with a single mouse and keyboard.
  • Reduce eye strain with RadiLight - illuminates the wall behind a monitor to reduce reflections on the screen
  • Hybrid Gamma PXL function automatically distinguishes between monochrome and color images
  • Sharpness recovery technology
  • DisplayPort connection – drive several monitors in a daisy chain sequence
  • Black front bezels are ideal for reading in dark environments
  • USB Hub and USB Type-C for charging
